player_information.key_achievements: Career-high 81 receptions and 1,055 receiving yards in 2021, set Bears franchise record for most catches by a rookie (61 in 2020), signed 3-year $39 million contract with Atlanta Falcons in 2024, recorded career-high 5 touchdowns in 2024
player_information.performance_goals: Establishing himself as a consistent deep threat and primary receiving option for the Falcons offense

team_information.team_strategy: Building offensive firepower around new quarterback Kirk Cousins and deep receiving corps
team_information.team_success: Recently retooled roster with significant offensive additions in 2024

contract_financial_details.performance_metrics: receptions, receiving yards, yards per catch average, deep ball connections, and touchdown production
